feels.name: Anger
feels.quote: You shall keep your ill-gotten money. If I had any fortune of my own, I would willingly pay it to any one who could disprove what you have told me.

feels.name: Indignation
feels.quote: I will not hear any evil spoken of Mr. Ladislaw; he has already suffered too much injustice.

feels.name: Sadness
feels.quote: The tears came and rolled down her cheeks, but she did not know it.
